mapper.insert:
insert into studyabroadapplication ( GUID, StudentGUID, School, College, Profession, PhotoID, TaughtBy, StartYear, FundingSource, Degree, AdmissionSeason, English, Hsk, Ielts, Toefl, ReferenceBy, ReferenceTel, Finacial, Guarantorin, GuarantorinTel, Guardian, ValidPassport, GraduateCertificate, HighestAcademic, CollegeTranscript, JuniorCollegeDiploma, ChineseLanguageCertificate, MedicalReport, StudyPlan, StreetAddress, CityProvince, Country, CountryEmail, CountryPhone, CountryZipcode, ApplyEmail, ApplyPhone, ApplyAddress, ApplyZipcode, ReceiveName, ReceiveCity, ReceiveAddress, ReceivePhone, ReceiveCountry, ReceiverZipcode, ApplicationNode, Type, Status, AuditResult, CreatedTime, UpdatedTime, Deleted, PassportNo, PassportName, ExpireAt, FamilyName, GivenName, HighestDegree, Religion, Nationality, Mothertongue, EmigrantFlag, BirthDate, BirthPlace, MaritalStatus, EducationalExperience ) values
( #{item.guid}, #{item.studentguid}, #{item.school}, #{item.college}, #{item.profession}, #{item.photoid}, #{item.taughtby}, #{item.startyear}, #{item.fundingsource}, #{item.degree}, #{item.admissionseason}, #{item.english}, #{item.hsk}, #{item.ielts}, #{item.toefl}, #{item.referenceby}, #{item.referencetel}, #{item.finacial}, #{item.guarantorin}, #{item.guarantorintel}, #{item.guardian}, #{item.validpassport}, #{item.graduatecertificate}, #{item.highestacademic}, #{item.collegetranscript}, #{item.juniorcollegedipint}, #{item.chineselanguagecertificate}, #{item.medicalreport}, #{item.studyplan}, #{item.streetaddress}, #{item.cityprovince}, #{item.country}, #{item.countryemail}, #{item.countryphone}, #{item.countryzipcode}, #{item.applyemail}, #{item.applyphone}, #{item.applyaddress}, #{item.applyzipcode}, #{item.receivename}, #{item.receivercity}, #{item.receiveraddress}, #{item.receiverphone}, #{item.receivercountry}, #{item.receiverzipcode}, #{item.applicationnode}, #{item.type}, #{item.status}, #{item.auditresult}, #{item.createdtime}, #{item.updatedtime}, #{item.deleted}, #{item.passportcode}, #{item.passportname}, #{item.passportexpire}, #{item.familyname}, #{item.givenname}, #{item.highestdegree}, #{item.religion}, #{item.nationality}, #{item.mothertongue}, #{item.emigrantfrom}, #{item.birth}, #{item.birthplace}, #{item.maritalstatus}, #{item.educationalexperience} )

insert into studyabroadapplication ( GUID, StudentGUID, School, College, Profession, PhotoID, TaughtBy, StartYear, FundingSource, Degree, AdmissionSeason, English, Hsk, Ielts, Toefl, ReferenceBy, ReferenceTel, Finacial, Guarantorin, GuarantorinTel, Guardian, ValidPassport, GraduateCertificate, HighestAcademic, CollegeTranscript, Juniorcollegedipint, ChineseLanguageCertificate, MedicalReport, StudyPlan, StreetAddress, CityProvince, Country, CountryEmail, CountryPhone, CountryZipcode, ApplyEmail, ApplyPhone, ApplyAddress, ApplyZipcode, ReceiverName, ReceiverCity, ReceiverAddress, ReceiverPhone, ReceiverCountry, ReceiverZipcode, ApplicationNode, Type, AuditResult, CreatedTime, UpdatedTime, Deleted, PassportCode, PassportName, PassportExpire, FamilyName, GivenName, HighestDegree, Religion, Nationality, Mothertongue, EmigrantFrom, Birth, BirthPlace, MaritalStatus, EducationalExperience ) values ( #{guid}, #{studentguid}, #{school}, #{college}, #{profession}, #{photoid}, #{taughtby}, #{startyear}, #{fundingsource}, #{degree}, #{admissionseason}, #{english}, #{hsk}, #{ielts}, #{toefl}, #{referenceby}, #{referencetel}, #{finacial}, #{guarantorin}, #{guarantorintel}, #{guardian}, #{validpassport}, #{graduatecertificate}, #{highestacademic}, #{collegetranscript}, #{juniorcollegedipint}, #{chineselanguagecertificate}, #{medicalreport}, #{studyplan}, #{streetaddress}, #{cityprovince}, #{country}, #{countryemail}, #{countryphone}, #{countryzipcode}, #{applyemail}, #{applyphone}, #{applyaddress}, #{applyzipcode}, #{receivername}, #{receivercity}, #{receiveraddress}, #{receiverphone}, #{receivercountry}, #{receiverzipcode}, #{applicationnode}, #{type}, #{auditresult}, #{createdtime}, #{updatedtime}, #{deleted}, #{passportcode}, #{passportname}, #{passportexpire}, #{familyname}, #{givenname}, #{highestdegree}, #{religion}, #{nationality}, #{mothertongue}, #{emigrantfrom}, #{birth}, #{birthplace}, #{maritalstatus}, #{educationalexperience} )
mapper.update: update studyabroadapplication set Status = #{status} where GUID = #{applyid} and StudentGUID = #{userid}
mapper.select: select GUID, StudentGUID, School, (SELECT Name FROM `college` where GUID = College ) as College, (SELECT Name FROM `profession` where GUID = Profession ) as Profession, PhotoID, TaughtBy, StartYear, FundingSource, Degree, AdmissionSeason, English, Hsk, Ielts, Toefl, ReferenceBy, ReferenceTel, Finacial, Guarantorin, GuarantorinTel, Guardian, ValidPassport, GraduateCertificate, HighestAcademic, CollegeTranscript, Juniorcollegedipint, ChineseLanguageCertificate, MedicalReport, StudyPlan, StreetAddress, CityProvince, Country, CountryEmail, CountryPhone, CountryZipcode, ApplyEmail, ApplyPhone, ApplyAddress, ApplyZipcode, ReceiverName, ReceiverCity, ReceiverAddress, ReceiverPhone, ReceiverCountry, ReceiverZipcode, ApplicationNode, Type, status, AuditResult, CreatedTime, UpdatedTime, Deleted, PassportCode, PassportName, PassportExpire, FamilyName, GivenName, HighestDegree, Religion, Nationality, Mothertongue, EmigrantFrom, Birth, BirthPlace, MaritalStatus, EducationalExperience from studyabroadapplication where StudentGUID = #{userid}

select GUID, StudentGUID, School, (SELECT Name FROM `college` where GUID = College ) as College, (SELECT Name FROM `profession` where GUID = Profession ) as Profession, PhotoID, TaughtBy, StartYear, FundingSource, Degree, AdmissionSeason, English, Hsk, Ielts, Toefl, ReferenceBy, ReferenceTel, Finacial, Guarantorin, GuarantorinTel, Guardian, ValidPassport, GraduateCertificate, HighestAcademic, CollegeTranscript, Juniorcollegedipint, ChineseLanguageCertificate, MedicalReport, StudyPlan, StreetAddress, CityProvince, Country, CountryEmail, CountryPhone, CountryZipcode, ApplyEmail, ApplyPhone, ApplyAddress, ApplyZipcode, ReceiverName, ReceiverCity, ReceiverAddress, ReceiverPhone, ReceiverCountry, ReceiverZipcode, ApplicationNode, Type, status, AuditResult, CreatedTime, UpdatedTime, Deleted, PassportCode, PassportName, PassportExpire, FamilyName, GivenName, HighestDegree, Religion, Nationality, Mothertongue, EmigrantFrom, Birth, BirthPlace, MaritalStatus, EducationalExperience from studyabroadapplication where StudentGUID = #{userid} and status = #{status}
